name: 2D Golf Alpha
description: Angry birds meets golfing!  Drag to shoot in this simple 2D golf puzzlelike game.  One of my first few games as I work to become a hobbyist game dev.  For some reason after uploading the camera is far too zoomed in making it nearly unplayable but after troubleshooting for a few hours I'm still at a loss lol.   Would love some help with this if anyone who finds this knows what this is about.  Thanks and enjoy!
